mapper.sql: id, username, password, role_name, creator, create_time, is_delete, delete_time
mapper.select:
select id, username from cs_user where role_name = #{roleName} and is_delete = false
and username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
mapper.update: update cs_user set is_delete = true, delete_time = now() where id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into cs_user (id, username, password, role_name, creator, create_time, is_delete, delete_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update cs_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
